amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 66. Record Vote Number: 1.

action.text: Amendment SA 1 proposed by Senator Warren.
